stories.text:
I am at the end of my Business Informatics Master's degree and now I just have to write my Master's thesis.
I am having a lot of trouble finding an exciting topic in cloud computing that is worth researching, as most of the topics I can think of are already covered by existing research.
I thought it would be worth a try to ask for your ideas here, as perhaps you have come across topics in cloud computing (e.g. architecture) that are not yet sufficiently covered but are worthy of a thesis?
All suggestions are highly welcome and in case I chose your suggestion I would gladly share the result in 6 months with you!
stories.title: Looking for master thesis suggestions (cloud computing)
